definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Stellite 6 seating faces for long service life.
sentences.chinese: 鎢鉻鈷合金6閥座面，使用壽命更長。

sentences.english: An impure oxide of cobalt, used to produce a blue color in enamel and in the making of smalt.
sentences.chinese: 淺的綠藍色顏料，主要由鈷和錫的氧化物組成。

sentences.english: Co-based wire is a kind of raw material for the crane.
sentences.chinese: 鈷基焊絲是一種用於起重機的原材料。
焊接連接閥座採用鎢鉻鈷合金6閥座面。

sentences.english: The photocurrent of Copper-Cobalt alloys electrodes changes with the concentration of cobalt.
sentences.chinese: 銅鈷合金電極的光響應隨含鈷量而變化。

sentences.english: Pattern was then transferred to a metal mold using Nickel-Cobalt electroforming.
sentences.chinese: 其次，以鎳鈷電鑄將週期條紋圖案轉移至金屬模仁。

sentences.english: Self-drying lacquer at room temperature could be obtained, if a little cobalt naphthenate was added into the Product.
sentences.chinese: 若在產物中加入少量環烷酸鈷可得室溫自幹清漆。

sentences.english: USES: Used for making metallic samarium, permanent magnetic materials and electronic devices, etc.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了採用釤鈷永磁鐵的夾具設計方案。

sentences.english: The cobalt contents were normal in most feedstuffs and forages.
sentences.chinese: 鈷在大多數飼料中含量正常。

sentences.english: The effects of cobalt on the reduction of molybdenum powder and mechanical properties of annealed Mo wire were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了鈷對鉬粉還原過程及退火鉬絲力學性能的影響。

sentences.english: Central Pacific seamounts are mainly distribution areas of Co-rich crusts.
sentences.chinese: 中太平洋海區是富鈷結殼的主要分佈區。

sentences.english: Trim numbers with H have cobalt alloy hard faced seat ring facing.
sentences.chinese: 帶有H的閥內件型號具有鈷合金硬麪閥座環表面。

sentences.english: The major Chinese cobalt producer is also looking for partners to develop downstream, Shao said.
sentences.chinese: 中國主要鈷生產商也在尋找下游合作伙伴，邵說。

sentences.english: Take some cobalt bluish-gray and paint it on the corrugated roof.
sentences.chinese: 採取一些鈷藍灰色，畫上它的波紋屋頂。

sentences.english: NdFeB and Alnico magnets how to identify?
sentences.chinese: 釹鐵硼和鋁鎳鈷磁鐵怎樣鑑別？

sentences.english: The recovered cobalt and manganese acetates can be reused for catalyst.
sentences.chinese: 回收的醋酸鈷和醋酸錳可以重複用作催化劑。

definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
variant of 銹|锈, to corrode/to rust
